Posts.Content: mima8 wrote: had a mammogram and ultrasound 4yrs ago, showing small cysts in right breast. had another 4 months ago, no change. had yellow discharge from both breasts prior to seeing the doctor 4 months ago. just saw doctor for follow up and left breast was clear discharge. doctor wants to do a total duct excision in 4wks. am feeling very frightened by the surgery and not sure how nescessary to have it done at this stage. l hadn't noticed any discharge in between visits. has anyone had this surgery, how quick was the recovery, any persisting numbness, what was the diagnosis? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: total duct excision mima8 Moderators
